name: 2022 8th International Conference on Environment and Bio-Engineering
content: Paper Publication: 1\. Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264): indexed by Scopus (since 2019), DOAJ, Crossref, ProQuest, EBSCO, etc. 2\. International Journal of Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (IJBBB, ISSN: 2010-3638): indexed by Electronic Journals Library, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), Google Scholar, and ProQuest.
